results.prompt: Describe this image with high precision. Pay special attention to exact text, numbers, symbols, and spatial relationships. Avoid speculation and focus on observable facts.
results.output_text:
The image displays a comparison between two large bases, one being the former base and the other being the current base. The former base has a height of 340 meters, while the current base has a height of 110 meters. There is a significant difference in height between the two bases.

In addition to the height comparison, the image also shows the number of parasols in each base. The former base has 13 parasols, while the current base has 12 parasols. The differences in the number of parasols between the two bases are also highlighted in the image.
